name: Rails Against Depopulation
description:
Rails against depopulation is an Strategy Puzzle game about a train who prevents depopulation of rural villages born from a Game Jam with permanent change theme.

On this game you must place rails in order to make a path who connects all the villages. You can only place rails two quads away from the train and these appears randomly.
To overcome the level you must avoid derailing or crashing into trees and villages.Use space key to increase train speed on your convenience.

Please enjoy our game and give us feedback! Have fun!
